detail_desc: Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Chest pocket, two flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs.
Fine-knit bolero containing some glittery threads. Buttons down the front and a flower appliqué in airy fabric.

Cold shoulder playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, short sleeves with a frill trim at the top, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal Alice band with glittery decorations in the shape of reindeer antlers.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Scarf in a patterned cotton weave. Size 45x45 cm.
Bomber jacket in glossy, patterned satin with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Raglan sleeves, diagonal front pockets and wide, covered elastication at the hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with an unlined hood. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
5-pocket skinny-fit, low-rise jeans in washed denim with worn details, and a zip fly and button.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with a sheen, with a deep V-neck, wrapover front and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back, a seam with pleats and a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a textured weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, off-centre buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Tulle skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Metal chain necklace. Adjustable length.
Leggings in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist and flared hems.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist and slim legs.
Wide blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long balloon sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs with a slit. Seam and a wide flounce at the hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with a flounce and decorative buttons at the top, flounced shoulder straps and a small opening with a concealed button at the back. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie-belt at the waist, and side pockets.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with a washed look, high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Satin-covered Alice band decorated with butterflies. The butterflies have reversible sequins on their wings.
Soft, non-wired, push-up bras with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and no fasteners.
Slim-fit trousers in ribbed jersey with a regular, elasticated waist and flared legs.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton with a wider neckline. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in soft, gently draping Tencel™ lyocell denim with a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and fake back pockets. Soft jersey panel at the waist for optimum fit.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pool shoes with a solid colour foot strap and moulded soles that are patterned underneath.
Espadrilles in suede with a braided jute trim around the soles and a wide strap at the back that can be wound around the ankle. Thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a wrapover and buttons at the front. Lined.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastic at the hems.
Ribbed top with a boat neck, long dolman sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, button placket and flap chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a seam with a drawstring and ties under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved lace top with a small stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif at the top and a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with smocking at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, laser-cut edges and narrow, detachable shoulder straps. Metal fastener at the back.
5-pocket jeans in soft, washed stretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and slim legs with narrow hems.

Dress in softly draping, patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with gathers for added width and soft draping. Lined.

Full-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front for width in the legs. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and concealed pockets in the side seams. The polyester content of the pocket lining is recycled.
Ankle-length jeans in coated stretch twill with a high waist and visible zip at the front. Fake welt front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Dog jumper in a soft knit with contrasting colour pompoms on the back, a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and back.
Short dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a round neckline that has an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Jacquard-knit socks in a stretch cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Short-sleeved shirt in patterned Tencel™ lyocell with a turn-down collar, French front and straight hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Baby Exclusive. Balaclava in soft wool jersey.

Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Frill-trimmed V-neck, a frill-trimmed yoke front and back, dropped shoulders, short, flounced sleeves, and a scalloped hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit, an all-in-one suit and a hat in a soft cotton blend. Jersey bodysuit with press-studs at the sides and crotch. Velour all-in-one suit with concealed, off-centre, press-stud fastenings down the front and along one leg, and full feet with elasticated heels. Velour hat with a jersey hem. The cotton content of the garments is organic.
Cap in woven fabric with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Braided headband in a soft knit.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and short slits in the sides.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and flatlock seams.

Set with a sweatshirt and pair of joggers in soft fabric. Block-coloured top with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, side pockets and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the top. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Wide top in soft jersey with short dolman sleeves with lace insets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood. Low dropped shoulders, concealed pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and appliqués in an embroidered weave at the sides.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Padded sleep bag in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Short parka in washed cotton twill with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and press-studs at the cuffs. Zipped side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Leggings in soft washed denim with a regular, elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Cropped top in softly draping satin with a draped neckline at the front, low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and concealed zip in one side.

Padded parka with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and a small zipped pocket on each sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Loafers in shiny imitation leather with a fringed strap across the front. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel approx. 5.5 cm.
